text: The district administration had called upon ex-servicemen to apply for service as special guards ahead of the Assembly elections in the district. According to the administration, able-bodied ex-servicemen, with the ability to function as special security personnel, are invited to apply to the Department of Ex-servicemen Welfare here. Interested persons may get the application forms from the office of ex-servicemen welfare at the Collectorate and apply. Further details may be had over phone on 04343- 236134.
title: Applications invited
